import React, { useState } from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import logo from '../static/icons/Logo.svg' import '../static/css/base.css' import { useHttp } from '../hooks/http.hook' export const AuthPage = () =>{ const [authForm, setAuthForm] = useState({ login:'', password:'' }) const ChangeHandler = event =>{ setAuthForm({...authForm, [event.target.name]:event.target.value}) } const {loading, error, request} = useHttp() return (

Welcome

please, login in to your accout

) }
